  4. Burial On The Presidio Banks

Notes

Threefold edition pressed on white (side A/B), black (side C/D) and grey marbled (side E/F) vinyl. Includes a download code of the entire album. Catalog number 'MBL160-1' is printed on the spine. Catalog number '1.1.2.' is printed on the back cover. The tracks are sequentially listed in roman numbers on the back cover. Design credit role is taken from the label page. Two stickers on shrink wrap. On first sticker: Limited Edition Color Vinyl On second sticker: 85-Minute Album Recorded at Harpa Concert Hall On back: Recorded at Harpa Concert Hall in Reykjavik, Iceland Pressing plant is uncredited, derived from the runout etchings.
